examples.example: 这一类问题都有着相似的解决方法。

translate.english: This kind of problems all have similar solutions.

examples.example: 生活中有这样一类人，他们总是充满热情地帮助他人，传递着温暖与善意。

translate.english: There are such a kind of people in life, who are always full of enthusiasm to help others, conveying warmth and kindness.

examples.example: 社会上有一类志愿者，他们无私地奉献自己的时间和精力去帮助他人。

translate.english: There is a kind of volunteers in the society, who selflessly dedicate their time and energy to helping others.
